name: Shim Map - Vanilla Kit PVP
summary: A kit PVP map that can be used in vanilla Minecraft
short_description:
A MC Kit PVP map made by Shimato123, jenstheuber, AwesomeJoshua, Halaro, happyuvnu2, and kjell987.

If you enjoy this map, please support our channels:
Shimato123 - www.youtube.com/Shimato123
jenstheuber - www.youtube.com/channel/UCToCaf00Bzske_-7Zitx_Hg
AwesomeJoshua - www.youtube.com/SuperAwesomeJoshua

Visit the Shimato Productions website at: http://full.sc/1btY8Cy
